import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { fetchGrades } from '../services/gradeServices' import { deleteStudentFromDatabase, fetchUserStudents } from '../services/studentServices' export const Students = ({ user }) => { const [chosenStudent, setChosenStudent] = useState({ email: "select a student to see the student email", gpa: "select a student to see student gpa", gradeId: "select a student to see student grade" }) const [grades, setGrades] = useState([]) const [userStudents, setUserStudents] = useState([]) const handleChosenStudent = (studentId) => { const updatedChosenStudent = userStudents.find((student) => student.id === studentId) setChosenStudent(updatedChosenStudent) } const handleDeleteStudent = () => { deleteStudentFromDatabase(chosenStudent.id).then(() => hand) } const handleFetchGrades = () => { fetchGrades().then((data) => { setGrades(data) }) } const handleFetchUserStudents = () => { fetchUserStudents(user.id).then((data) => { setUserStudents(data) }) } useEffect(() => { handleFetchUserStudents() handleFetchGrades() }, [user.id]) return ( <>

{userStudents.length} students

{userStudents.map((userStudent) => { return ( <>
{ handleChosenStudent(userStudent.id) }} />

{userStudent.firstName} {userStudent.lastName}

{grades.find((grade) => grade.id === userStudent.gradeId)?.level} Grade

) })}

{chosenStudent.firstName} {chosenStudent.lastName}

Student login code: {chosenStudent.studentCode}{chosenStudent.id}

  • Email: {chosenStudent.email}

  • GPA: {chosenStudent.gpa}

  • Grade: {chosenStudent.gradeId >= 0 ? grades.find((grade) => grade.id === chosenStudent.gradeId).level : chosenStudent.gradeId}

) }
